body_html:
The Windows failure appears to be incorrect use of AT_API:

23:30:07 [396/443] Building CXX object src\ATen\test\CMakeFiles\apply_test.dir\apply_test.cpp.obj
23:30:07 ..\src\ATen/cuda/detail/TensorInfo.cuh(63): error C2491: 'at::cuda::detail::TensorInfo<T,IndexType>::TensorInfo': definition of dllimport function not allowed
23:30:07 ..\src\ATen/cuda/detail/TensorInfo.cuh(70): error C2491: 'at::cuda::detail::TensorInfo<T,IndexType>::reduceDim': definition of dllimport function not allowed
23:30:07 ..\src\ATen/cuda/detail/TensorInfo.cuh(139): error C2491: 'at::cuda::detail::TensorInfo<T,IndexType>::collapseDims': definition of dllimport function not allowed

Unfortunately, I don't know anything about Windows development and don't have a Windows machine readily available. Is there someone familiar with Windows for who would immediately know the appropriate fix here?

(Looking at the Linux failure now.)

Edit: Some cursory Googling suggests that TensorInfo being a class template may make exporting it a challenge. One option might be to disable the tests on Windows?

body:
The Windows failure appears to be incorrect use of AT_API:

23:30:07 [396/443] Building CXX object src\ATen\test\CMakeFiles\apply_test.dir\apply_test.cpp.obj
23:30:07 ..\src\ATen/cuda/detail/TensorInfo.cuh(63): error C2491: 'at::cuda::detail::TensorInfo<T,IndexType>::TensorInfo': definition of dllimport function not allowed
23:30:07 ..\src\ATen/cuda/detail/TensorInfo.cuh(70): error C2491: 'at::cuda::detail::TensorInfo<T,IndexType>::reduceDim': definition of dllimport function not allowed
23:30:07 ..\src\ATen/cuda/detail/TensorInfo.cuh(139): error C2491: 'at::cuda::detail::TensorInfo<T,IndexType>::collapseDims': definition of dllimport function not allowed

Unfortunately, I don't know anything about Windows development and don't have a Windows machine readily available. Is there someone familiar with Windows for who would immediately know the appropriate fix here? 

(Looking at the Linux failure now.)

Edit: Some cursory Googling suggests that TensorInfo being a class template may make exporting it a challenge. One option might be to disable the tests on Windows?
